title: Used to be my favorite game.
author: benwarkov
review:
This game was great, arguably my favorite game to play both on Xbox and eventually mobile when I started caring less. It started off as an amazing free to play game, primarily for the reason that the developers were willing to listen to the community and implement changes that would benefit the user experience. 
However, I genuinely believe that the game is dying due to the fact that Epic feels the need to continuously change things that would have benefitted the game if left alone. For example, siphon. Gaining health from kills is something that seriously helped the campy/die-in-the-storm nature of the game that angers everyone, and it has been added and taken away from the game twice. 
In addition, there have been many additions to the core game mode that heavily changed the meta. Adding zombies, taking them away, then adding more, then adding mist: all effects that could have served a fun purpose if added as tertiary game modes. Taking a break from this game makes it extremely hard to come back and know how to act in the meta unless you watch constant fortnite streams or YouTube videos (which get really old). 
Yeah Iâ€™m a little salty, but hey. I didnâ€™t want to stop playing. I just had to move on to other games because I need STABILITY.
